duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, item specific training, coordination, and data analysis.
Applying science expertise throughout multiple parts of the item development and scoring process, including meetings with clients and educators.
Clear communication via chat, email, phone, posted reports, and videoconference meetings, with in-person and virtual interactions with customers and educators.
Mentoring and training Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in the expectations of their roles as well as how to perform those duties.
Training educators and managing the workflow and client expectations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
